parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Request ID for identifying the request. String not longer than 2048.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Requested response format. If not set, the Accept-Header is used. If both are missing application/xml is used

parameters.name: jsonpCallback
parameters.description: Requests the JSON response data is wrapped into a JavaScript function with that name. String not longer than 1024.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language of the journey planer. String not longer than 5.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
Specifies the station/stop ID for which the arrivals shall be retrieved. Required if extId is not present. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: extId
parameters.description:
Deprecated. Please use `id` as it supports external IDs.

Specifies the external station/stop ID for which the arrivals shall be retrieved. Required if id is not present. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.21

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description:
If only vehicles departing or arriving from a certain direction shall be returned, specify the direction by giving the station/stop ID of the last stop on the journey. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Sets the start date for which the departures shall be retrieved. Represented in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: time
parameters.description:
Sets the start time for which the departures shall be retrieved. Represented in the format hh:mm[:ss] in 24h nomenclature. Seconds will be ignored for requests.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description:
Set the interval size in minutes. Range: 0-1439

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: maxJourneys
parameters.description:
Maximum number of journeys to be returned. If no value is defined or -1, all departing/arriving services within the duration sized period are returned. Minimum of -1.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: products
parameters.description:
Decimal value defining the product classes to be included in the search. It represents a bitmask combining bit number of a product as defined in the HAFAS raw data. Values are retrievable by <<service_datainfo,Data Information service>>. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 1.12

parameters.name: operators
parameters.description:
Only journeys provided by the given operators are part of the result. To filter multiple operators, separate the codes by comma.
If the operator should not be part of the journeys, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description:
Only journeys provided by the given categories are part of the result. To filter multiple categories, separate the codes by comma.
If the category should not be part of the journeys, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.25

parameters.name: lines
parameters.description:
Only journeys running the given line are part of the result. To filter multiple lines, separate the codes by comma. If the line should not be part of the be trip, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description:
Filter boards by one or more attribute codes of a journey. Multiple attribute codes are separated by comma. If the attribute should not be part of the result, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: platforms
parameters.description:
Filter boards by platform. Multiple platforms are separated by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.7.2

parameters.name: passlist
parameters.description:
Include a list of all passed waystops?

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: passlistMaxStops
parameters.description:
Maximum number of stops including requested stop and last stop. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: minDur
parameters.description:
Minimum duration a journey has left to be returned. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: baim
parameters.description:
Enables/disables BAIM information.

Since version: 2.26

parameters.name: rtMode
parameters.description:
Set the realtime mode to be used.

Since version: 2.34

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Set the station arrival board type to be used.

ARR: Arrival board as configured in HAFAS
ARR_EQUIVS: Arrival board with all journeys at any masts and equivalent stops
ARR_MAST: Arrival board at mast
ARR_STATION: Arrival board with all journeys at any masts of the requested station

Since version: 2.12

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Request ID for identifying the request. String not longer than 2048.

Minimum duration a journey has left to be returned. Minimum of 0.

parameters.name: baim
parameters.description:
Enables/disables BAIM information.

Since version: 2.26

parameters.name: rtMode
parameters.description:
Set the realtime mode to be used.

Since version: 2.34

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Set the station departure board type to be used.

DEP: Departure board as configured in HAFAS
DEP_EQUIVS: Departure board with all journeys at any masts and equivalent stops
DEP_MAST: Departure board at mast
DEP_STATION: Departure board with all journeys at any masts of the requested station

Since version: 2.12

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Request ID for identifying the request. String not longer than 2048.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Requested response format. If not set, the Accept-Header is used. If both are missing application/xml is used

parameters.name: jsonpCallback
parameters.description: Requests the JSON response data is wrapped into a JavaScript function with that name. String not longer than 1024.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language of the journey planer. String not longer than 5.

parameters.name: ctx
parameters.description:
Specifies the GIS route context. String not longer than 8096.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: poly
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the calculation of the polyline.

Since version: 1.11

parameters.name: polyEnc
parameters.description:
Defines encoding of the returned polyline. Possible values are N (no encoding / compression), DLT (delta to the previous coordinate), GPA (Google encoded polyline format) defaults to N. Not all option might be available in your installation.

Since version: 1.11

parameters.name: eco
parameters.description:
Enables/disables eco value calculation.

Since version: 1.23.9

parameters.name: baim
parameters.description:
Enables/disables BAIM.

Since version: 2.39

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Request ID for identifying the request. String not longer than 2048.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Requested response format. If not set, the Accept-Header is used. If both are missing application/xml is used

parameters.name: jsonpCallback
parameters.description: Requests the JSON response data is wrapped into a JavaScript function with that name. String not longer than 1024.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language of the journey planer. String not longer than 5.

parameters.name: dateB
parameters.description:
Sets the event period start date.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: dateE
parameters.description:
Sets the event period end date.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: timeB
parameters.description:
Sets the event period start time.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: timeE
parameters.description:
Sets the event period end time.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: weekdays
parameters.description:
Bitmask for validity of HIM messages based on weekdays. Each character represents a weekday starting on monday.

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: himIds
parameters.description:
List of HIM message IDs seperated by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: hierarchicalView
parameters.description:
Return parent messages with childs.

Since version: 2.8.1

parameters.name: operators
parameters.description:
List of operators seperated by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description:
List of train categories seperated by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: channels
parameters.description:
List of channels seperated by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: companies
parameters.description:
List of companies seperated by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: lines
parameters.description:
Only HIM messages for the given line are part of the result. To filter multiple lines, separate the codes by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: lineids
parameters.description:
Only HIM messages for the given line (identified by its line ID) are part of the result. To filter multiple lines, separate the line IDs by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.11

parameters.name: stations
parameters.description:
List of (external) station ids to be filtered for seperated by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: fromstation
parameters.description:
Filter messages by line segment starting at this station given as (external) station id. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: tostation
parameters.description:
Filter messages by line segment travelling in direction of this station given as (external) station id. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: bothways
parameters.description:
If enabled, messages in both directions - from 'fromstation' to 'tostation' as well as from 'tostation' to 'fromstation' are returned

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: trainnames
parameters.description:
List of train name to be filtered for seperated by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: metas
parameters.description:
List of predefined filters seperated by comma. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: himcategory
parameters.description:
HIM category, e.g. Works and/or Disturbance. Value depends on your HAFAS server data. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.23.9

parameters.name: himtags
parameters.description:
HIM Tags. Value depends on your HAFAS server data. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.10

parameters.name: regions
parameters.description:
Filter for HIM messages based on regions defined in HAFAS raw data. Seperated by comma. Available regions can be retrieved by /datainfo service. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.16

parameters.name: himtext
parameters.description:
Filter for HIM messages containing the given free text message seperated by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: himtexttags
parameters.description:
Return HIM texts having this text tag(s) only. Multiple values are separated by comma. Note: HIM text tags differ from HIM tags. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.16

parameters.name: exthimtext
parameters.description:
Extended filter based on tags and and corresponding localized text fragments. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: additionalfields
parameters.description:
List of additional fields and values to be filtered for. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.22

parameters.name: extInfo
parameters.description:
Filter for HIM messages based on external ids and id sources. Different items are seperated by comma. Value seperated by pipe symbol. To negate put ! in front of the item. String not longer than 8096.

Since version: 2.38

parameters.name: poly
parameters.description:
Enables/disables returning of geo information for affected edges and regions if available and enabled in the backend.

Since version: 1.23.12

parameters.name: searchmode
parameters.description:
HIM search mode.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: affectedJourneyMode
parameters.description:
Define how to return affected journeys

Since version: 2.5

parameters.name: affectedJourneyStopMode
parameters.description:
Define how to return stops of affected journeys

Since version: 2.5

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description:
Define the Order the returned messages by fields and directions. Multiple, comma separated entries are supported Range: EVT_BEG_ASC,EVT_BEG_DESC,EVT_END_ASC,EVT_END_DESC,HID_ASC,HID_DESC,LMOD_ASC,LMOD_DESC,PRIO_ASC,PRIO_DESC

Since version: 2.4.1

parameters.name: minprio
parameters.description:
Filter for HIM messages having at least this priority. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: maxprio
parameters.description:
Filter for HIM messages having this priority as maximum. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 2.4

parameters.name: llLat
parameters.description:
Lower left latitude of bounding box.

Since version: 2.24.0

parameters.name: llLon
parameters.description:
Lower left longitude of bounding box.

Since version: 2.24.0

parameters.name: urLat
parameters.description:
Upper right latitude of bounding box.

Since version: 2.24.0

parameters.name: urLon
parameters.description:
Upper right longitude of bounding box.

Since version: 2.24.0

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Request ID for identifying the request. String not longer than 2048.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Requested response format. If not set, the Accept-Header is used. If both are missing application/xml is used

parameters.name: jsonpCallback
parameters.description: Requests the JSON response data is wrapped into a JavaScript function with that name. String not longer than 1024.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language of the journey planer. String not longer than 5.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
Specifies the internal journey id of the journey shall be retrieved. Maximum length 512. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Day of operation

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: poly
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the calculation of the polyline for each leg of the trip except any GIS route.

Since version: 1.11

parameters.name: polyEnc
parameters.description:
Defines encoding of the returned polyline. Possible values are N (no encoding / compression), DLT (delta to the previous coordinate), GPA (Google encoded polyline format) defaults to N. Not all option might be available in your installation.

Since version: 1.11

parameters.name: showPassingPoints
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the return of stops having no alighting and no boarding in its passlist for each leg of the trip.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: rtMode
parameters.description:
Set the realtime mode to be used.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: fromId
parameters.description:
Specifies the station/stop ID the partial itinerary shall start from. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 2.3

parameters.name: fromIdx
parameters.description:
Specifies the station/stop index the partial itinerary shall start from. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 2.3

parameters.name: toId
parameters.description:
Specifies the station/stop ID the partial itinerary shall end at. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 2.3

parameters.name: toIdx
parameters.description:
Specifies the station/stop index the partial itinerary shall end at. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 2.3

parameters.name: baim
parameters.description:
Enables/disables BAIM search and response.

Since version: 2.7.3

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Request ID for identifying the request. String not longer than 2048.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Requested response format. If not set, the Accept-Header is used. If both are missing application/xml is used

parameters.name: jsonpCallback
parameters.description: Requests the JSON response data is wrapped into a JavaScript function with that name. String not longer than 1024.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language of the journey planer. String not longer than 5.

parameters.name: llLat
parameters.description:
Lower left latitude of bounding box.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: llLon
parameters.description:
Lower left longitude of bounding box.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: urLat
parameters.description:
Upper right latitude of bounding box.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: urLon
parameters.description:
Upper right longitude of bounding box.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: operators
parameters.description:
Filter for operators. To filter multiple operators, separate the codes by comma. String not longer than 8096.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: products
parameters.description:
Decimal value defining the product classes to be included in the search. It represents a bitmask combining bit number of a product as defined in the HAFAS raw data. Values are retrievable by <<service_datainfo,Data Information service>>. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description:
Filter trips by one or more attribute codes of a journey. Multiple attribute codes are separated by comma. If the attribute should not be part of the be trip, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: jid
parameters.description:
Filter journeys by one or more journey id. Multiple journey ids are separated by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: lines
parameters.description:
Only journeys running the given line are part of the result. To filter multiple lines, separate the codes by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: infotexts
parameters.description:
Filter journeys by one or more custom infotext filters. Multiple infotexts are separated by comma. If the infotext should not be part of the be trip, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: maxJny
parameters.description:
Maximum number of journeys in response. Minimum of 0. Range: 1-1000

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: periodSize
parameters.description:
Size of interval journey positions should be retrieved in milliseonds. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 2.24

parameters.name: periodStep
parameters.description:
Size of interval steps. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 2.24

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Day of operation.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: time
parameters.description:
Time the service operates according to scheduled data. If not provided, the whole day is taken into account.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: positionMode
parameters.description:
Mode the used for position calculation. REPORT_ONLY: Only get back reported positions; CALC_REPORT: Use reported position if available, calculate if not; CALC: Calculate all positions; Default REPORT_ONLY

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Request ID for identifying the request. String not longer than 2048.

parameters.description: Requested response format. If not set, the Accept-Header is used. If both are missing application/xml is used

parameters.description: Requests the JSON response data is wrapped into a JavaScript function with that name. String not longer than 1024.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language of the journey planer. String not longer than 5.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description:
Search for that token. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: maxNo
parameters.description:
Maximum number of returned stops. Range: 1-1000

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Type filter for location types.

Since version: 1.20

parameters.name: locationSelectionMode
parameters.description:
Selection mode for locations.

parameters.name: withEquivalentLocations
parameters.description:
Return equivalent locations.

Since version: 2.33

parameters.name: restrictSelection
parameters.description:
Restrict allowed stations.

Since version: 2.31

parameters.name: products
parameters.description:
Decimal value defining the product classes to be included in the search. It represents a bitmask combining bit number of a product as defined in the HAFAS raw data. Values are retrievable by <<service_datainfo,Data Information service>>. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 1.15

parameters.name: withProducts
parameters.description:
Return locations with products.

Since version: 2.28

If activated, only one representative of a location product per category is returned.

Latitude of centre coordinate.

Since version: 1.20

parameters.name: coordLong
parameters.description:
Longitude of centre coordinate.

Since version: 1.20

parameters.name: r
parameters.description:
Search radius in meter around the given coordinate if any. Minimum of 1.

Since version: 1.20

parameters.name: refineId
parameters.description:
In case of an refinable location, this value takes the ID of the refinable one of a previous result. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: meta
parameters.description:
Filter by a predefined meta filter. If the rules of the predefined filter should not be negated, put ! in front of it. Multiple values are separated by comma if definded for POI filtering. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: stations
parameters.description:
Filter for stations. Matches if the given value is prefix of any station ID. Multiple values are separated by comma. String not longer than 4096.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: sattributes
parameters.description:
Filter locations by one or more attribute codes. Multiple attribute codes are separated by comma. If the attribute should not be part of the be location data, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: sinfotexts
parameters.description:
Filter locations by one or more station infotext codes and values. Parameter structure is code|value. Multiple attribute codes are separated by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.24

parameters.name: filterMode
parameters.description:
Filter modes for nearby searches.

Since version: 2.7

parameters.name: poolId

Filter locations by pool id (also known as Pool UIC code). Multiple values are separated by comma. To negate put ! in front of the value. String not longer than 8096.

Filter by a predefined meta filter. If the rules of the predefined filter should not be negated, put ! in front of it. Multiple values are separated by comma if definded for POI filtering. String not longer than 512.

Filter locations by one or more attribute codes. Multiple attribute codes are separated by comma. If the attribute should not be part of the be location data, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Incorporate date. Represented in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

Since version: 2.39

parameters.name: time

Incorporate time. Represented in the format hh:mm[:ss] in 24h nomenclature. Seconds will be ignored for requests.

Since version: 2.39

parameters.description:
Retrieve stops most relevant to this map zoom level. Range: 0-21

Since version: 2.39

parameters.name: poiCategories

Filter locations by POI types. Multiple attribute codes are separated by comma. If the attribute should not be part of the be location data, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

parameters.name: polyEnc
parameters.description:
Defines encoding of the returned polyline. Possible values are N (no encoding / compression), DLT (delta to the previous coordinate), GPA (Google encoded polyline format) defaults to N. Not all option might be available in your installation.

Since version: 1.12

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Sets the start date for which the departures shall be retrieved. Represented in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

Since version: 1.12

parameters.name: useCombinedComparison
parameters.description: Compare based on combined output name - false: Compare parameters (category, line, train number) individually

parameters.name: acceptGaps
parameters.description:
Accept an incomplete description of the connection (with gaps) i.e. missing walks/transfers

Since version: 2.6.2

parameters.name: allowDummySections
parameters.description:
Allow a partial reconstruction that will not lead to a reconstruction failure if sections are not reconstructable. Instead, for theses inconstructable sections, dummy sections will be created in the result.

Since version: 2.11.0

parameters.name: flagAllNonReachable
parameters.description:
Should all non-reachable journeys be flagged (true), or only the first one encountered?

Since version: 2.6.2

parameters.name: matchCatStrict
parameters.description:
Should the category (Gattung) match exactly? Only applicable if useCombinedComparison is false

Since version: 2.6.2

parameters.name: matchIdNonBlank
parameters.description:
Should the train identifier (Zugbezeichner) without whitespace match?

Since version: 2.6.2

parameters.name: matchIdStrict
parameters.description:
Should the train identifier (Zugbezeichner) match exactly?

Since version: 2.6.2

parameters.name: matchNumStrict
parameters.description:
Should the train number (Zugnummer) match exactly? Only applicable if useCombinedComparison is false

Since version: 2.6.2

parameters.name: matchRtType
parameters.description:
Should the realtime type that journeys are based on (e.g. SOLL, IST, additional, deviation, ...) be considered?

Since version: 2.6.2

parameters.name: enableRtFullSearch
parameters.description:
By default, the reconstruction request makes one attempt for each journey within the scheduled data. However, the scheduled data may not necessarily reflect basic realtime properties of the journeys therein. In such a case, one may enable a two-step approach which we call "full search", i.e. search for matching journeys in the scheduled data in a first step. If this fails, then search for matching journeys in the realtime data.

Since version: 2.15

parameters.name: enableReplacements
parameters.description:
If set to true replaces cancelled journeys with their replacement journeys if possible.

Since version: 2.21.0

parameters.name: arrL
parameters.description:
Lower deviation in minutes within interval [0, 720] indicating "how much earlier than original arrival" Range: 0-720

Since version: 2.6.2

parameters.name: arrU
parameters.description:
Upper deviation in minutes within interval [0, 720] indicating "how much later than original arrival" Range: 0-720

Since version: 2.6.2

parameters.name: depL
parameters.description:
Lower deviation in minutes within interval [0, 720] indicating "how much earlier than original departure" Range: 0-720

Since version: 2.6.2

parameters.name: depU
parameters.description:
Upper deviation in minutes within interval [0, 720] indicating "how much later than original departure" Range: 0-720

Since version: 2.6.2

parameters.name: passlist
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the return of the passlist for each leg of the trip.

Since version: 1.12

parameters.name: showPassingPoints
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the return of stops having no alighting and boarding in its passlist for each leg of the trip. Needs passlist parameter enabled.

Since version: 1.12

parameters.name: rtMode
parameters.description:
Set the realtime mode to be used.

Since version: 2.10.0

parameters.name: baim
parameters.description:
Enables/disables BAIM.

Since version: 2.39

parameters.name: eco
parameters.description:
Only supported if legacy environmental calculator is used.

Deprecated. Enables/disables eco value calculation.

Since version: 1.23.9

parameters.name: ecoCmp
parameters.description:
Only supported if legacy environmental calculator is used.

Deprecated. Enables/disables eco comparison.

Since version: 1.23.9

parameters.name: ecoParams
parameters.description:
Provide additional eco parameters. Values vary. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.23.9

parameters.name: tariff
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the output of tariff data. The default is configurable via provisioning.

Since version: 2.7

parameters.name: trafficMessages
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the output of traffic messages. The default is configurable via provisioning.

Since version: 2.7

parameters.name: travellerProfileData
parameters.description:
Traveller profile data. Structure depends on set up. String not longer than 32768.

Since version: 2.15

parameters.name: withJourneyBoundaryPoints
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the return of journey boundary stops at public transport legs.

Since version: 2.24

parameters.name: freq
parameters.description:
Sets the frequency interval length for the search of journey alternatives in minutes. Using a value of 0 results in the suppression of the search for alternatives. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 2.35

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Request ID for identifying the request. String not longer than 2048.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Requested response format. If not set, the Accept-Header is used. If both are missing application/xml is used

parameters.name: jsonpCallback
parameters.description: Requests the JSON response data is wrapped into a JavaScript function with that name. String not longer than 1024.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The language of the journey planer. String not longer than 5.

parameters.name: originId
parameters.description:
Specifies the station/stop ID of the origin for the trip.
Such ID can be retrieved from the location.name or location.nearbystops services. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: originExtId
parameters.description:
Deprecated. Please use `originId` as it supports external IDs.

Specifies the external station/stop ID of the origin for the trip.
Such ID can be retrieved from the location.name or location.nearbystops services. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.20

parameters.name: originCoordLat
parameters.description:
Latitude of station/stop coordinate of the trips origin. The coordinate can be retrieved from the location.name or location.nearbystops services.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: originCoordLong
parameters.description:
Longitude of station/stop coordinate of the trips origin. The coordinate can be retrieved from the location.name or location.nearbystops services.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: originCoordName
parameters.description:
Name of the trip's origin if coordinate cannot be resolved to an address or poi. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 2.13

parameters.name: originCoordType
parameters.description:
Type of the trip's origin if coordinate cannot be resolved to an address or poi.

Since version: 2.30

parameters.name: destId
parameters.description:
Specifies the station/stop ID of the destination for the trip.
Such ID can be retrieved from the location.name or location.nearbystops services. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: destExtId
parameters.description:
Deprecated. Please use `destId` as it supports external IDs.

Specifies the external station/stop ID of the destination for the trip.
Such ID can be retrieved from the location.name or location.nearbystops services. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.20

parameters.name: destCoordLat
parameters.description:
Latitude of station/stop coordinate of the trips destination. The coordinate can be retrieved from the location.name or location.nearbystops services.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: destCoordLong
parameters.description:
Longitude of station/stop coordinate of the trips destination. The coordinate can be retrieved from the location.name or location.nearbystops services.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: destCoordName
parameters.description:
Name of the trip's destination if coordinate cannot be resolved to an address or poi. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 2.13

parameters.name: destCoordType
parameters.description:
Type of the trip's destination if coordinate cannot be resolved to an address or poi.

Since version: 2.30

parameters.name: via
parameters.description:
Complex structure to provide multiple via points separated by semicolon. String not longer than 8096.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: viaId
parameters.description:
ID of a station/stop used as a via for the trip. Specifying a via station forces the trip search to look for trips which must pass through this station.
Such IDs can be retrieved from the location.name or location.nearbystops services. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: viaWaitTime
parameters.description:
Defines the waiting time spent at via station in minutes. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: avoid
parameters.description:
Complex structure to provide multiple points to be avoided separated by semicolon. String not longer than 8096.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: avoidId
parameters.description:
ID of a station/stop to be avoided as transfer stop for the trip.
Such IDs can be retrieved from the location.name or location.nearbystops services. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.22.2

parameters.name: viaGis
parameters.description:
Complex structure to provide multiple GIS via locations separated by semicolon. String not longer than 8096.

Since version: 2.14

parameters.name: changeTimePercent
parameters.description:
Configures the walking speed when changing from one leg of the journey to the next one. It extends the time required for changes by a specified percentage.
A value of 200 doubles the change time as initially calculated by the system. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: minChangeTime
parameters.description:
Minimum change time at stop in minutes. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: maxChangeTime
parameters.description:
Maximum change time at stop in minutes. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 1.20

parameters.name: addChangeTime
parameters.description:
This amount of minutes is added to the change time at each stop. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: maxChange
parameters.description:
Maximum number of changes. Range: 0-11

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Sets the start date for which the departures shall be retrieved. Represented in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: time
parameters.description:
Sets the start time for which the departures shall be retrieved. Represented in the format hh:mm[:ss] in 24h nomenclature. Seconds will be ignored for requests.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: searchForArrival
parameters.description:
If set, the date and time parameters specify the arrival time for the trip search instead of the departure time.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: numF
parameters.description:
Minimum number of trips after or before the search time, depending on search direction. Sum of numF and numB has to be less or equal 6. The maximum value depends on the actual configuration.

Please see the section below about the search algorithm for more details. Range: 1-6

Since version: 1.10

parameters.name: numB
parameters.description:
Minimum number of trips before or after the search time, depending on search direction. Sum of numF and numB has to be less or equal 6. The maximum value depends on the actual configuration.

Please see the section below about the search algorithm for more details. Range: 0-5

Since version: 1.10

parameters.name: context
parameters.description:
Defines the starting point for the scroll back or forth operation. Use the scrB value from a previous result to scroll backwards in time and use the scrF value to scroll forth. String not longer than 8096.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: poly
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the calculation of the polyline for each leg of the trip except any GIS route.

Since version: 1.11

parameters.name: polyEnc
parameters.description:
Defines encoding of the returned polyline. Possible values are N (no encoding / compression), DLT (delta to the previous coordinate), GPA (Google encoded polyline format) defaults to N. Not all option might be available in your installation.

Since version: 1.11

parameters.name: passlist
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the return of the passlist for each leg of the trip.

Since version: 1.20

parameters.name: products
parameters.description:
Decimal value defining the product classes to be included in the search. It represents a bitmask combining bit number of a product as defined in the HAFAS raw data. Values are retrievable by <<service_datainfo,Data Information service>>. Minimum of 0.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: operators
parameters.description:
Only trips provided by the given operators are part of the result. To filter multiple operators, separate the codes by comma.
If the operator should not be part of the trip, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.12

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description:
Only trips provided by the given categories are part of the result. To filter multiple categories, separate the codes by comma.
If the category should not be part of the trip, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.25

parameters.name: categoryFlags
parameters.description:
Only trips matching the given category flags are part of the result. To filter multiple category flags, separate the codes by comma. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.35

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description:
Filter trips by one or more attribute codes of a journey. Multiple attribute codes are separated by comma. If the attribute should not be part of the be trip, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: sattributes
parameters.description:
Filter trips by one or more station attribute codes of a journey. Multiple attribute codes are separated by comma. If the attribute should not be part of the be trip, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.23.7

parameters.name: fattributes
parameters.description:
Filter trips by one or more footway attribute codes of a journey. Multiple attribute codes are separated by comma. If the attribute should not be part of the be trip, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 2.7

parameters.name: lines
parameters.description:
Only journeys running the given line are part of the result. To filter multiple lines, separate the codes by comma. If the line should not be part of the be trip, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: lineids
parameters.description:
Only journeys running the given line (identified by its line ID) are part of the result. To filter multiple lines, separate the line IDs by comma. If the line should not be part of the be trip, negate it by putting ! in front of it. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: avoidPaths
parameters.description:
Only path not having the given properties will be part of the result. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.12

parameters.name: originWalk
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using footpaths in the beginning of a trip when searching from an address. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: originBike
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using bike routes in the beginning of a trip when searching from an address. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: originCar
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using car in the beginning of a trip when searching from an address. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: originTaxi
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using taxi rides in the beginning of a trip when searching from an address. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: originPark
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using Park and Ride in the beginning of a trip when searching from an address String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: originMeta
parameters.description:
Enables using one or more predefined individual transport meta profile at the beginning of a trip. The profiles are defined in the HAFAS installation. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.23.25

parameters.name: destWalk
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using footpaths at the end of a trip when searching to an address. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: destBike
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using bike routes at the end of a trip when searching to an address. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: destCar
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using car routes at the end of a trip when searching to an address. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: destTaxi
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using taxi rides at the end of a trip when searching to an address. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: destPark
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using Park and Ride at the end of a trip when searching to an address. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: destMeta
parameters.description:
Enables using one or more predefined individual transport meta profile at the end of a trip. The profiles are defined in the HAFAS installation. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.23.25

parameters.name: totalWalk
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using footpaths for the whole trip. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.23.20

parameters.name: totalBike
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using bike routes for the whole trip. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.23.20

parameters.name: totalCar
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using car routes for the whole trip. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.23.20

parameters.name: totalTaxi
parameters.description:
Enables/disables using taxi rides for the whole trip. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.23.20

parameters.name: totalMeta
parameters.description:
Enables using one or more predefined individual transport meta profile for a trip. The profiles are defined in the HAFAS installation. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.23.25

parameters.name: gisProducts
parameters.description:
Filter on GIS product, e.g. specific sharing provider. Currently, only exclusion of certain providers is available by adding ! in front of the provider meta code. Available codes are customer sprecific. String not longer than 8096.

Since version: 2.19

parameters.name: includeIv
parameters.description:
Enables/disables search for individual transport routes.

Since version: 2.6.5

parameters.name: ivOnly
parameters.description:
Enables/disables search for individual transport routes only.

Since version: 1.23.20

parameters.name: includeDrt
parameters.description:
Enables/disables search for DRT routes.

Since version: 2.42

parameters.name: mobilityProfile
parameters.description:
Use a predefined filter by its name. The filters are defined in the HAFAS installation. If the filter should be negated, put a ! in front of its name. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: bikeCarriage
parameters.description:
Enables/disables search for trips explicit allowing bike carriage.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: bikeCarriageType
parameters.description:
Filter for a specific bike carriage type. Allowed types are SINGLEBIKES, SMALLGROUPS and LARGEGROUPS. May be not available in any installation.

Since version: 2.16

parameters.name: sleepingCar
parameters.description:
Enables/disables search for trips having sleeping car.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: couchetteCoach
parameters.description:
Enables/disables search for trips having couchette coach.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: showPassingPoints
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the return of stops having no alighting and boarding in its passlist for each leg of the trip. Needs passlist enabled.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: baim
parameters.description:
Enables/disables BAIM search and response.

Since version: 1.23.8

parameters.name: eco
parameters.description:
Only supported if legacy environmental calculator is used.

Deprecated. Enables/disables eco value calculation.

Since version: 1.23.9

parameters.name: ecoCmp
parameters.description:
Only supported if legacy environmental calculator is used.

Deprecated. Enables/disables eco comparison.

Since version: 1.23.9

parameters.name: ecoParams
parameters.description:
Provide additional eco parameters. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.23.9

parameters.name: rtMode
parameters.description:
Set the realtime mode to be used.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: unsharp
parameters.description:
Enables/disables unsharp search mode.

Since version: 1.23.13

parameters.name: trainFilter
parameters.description:
Filters a trip search for a certain train. String not longer than 1024.

Since version: 1.23.9

parameters.name: economic
parameters.description:
Enables/disables economic search mode.

Since version: 1.23.14

parameters.name: allowFootpathEquivalences
parameters.description:
If the walk is disabled or a maximum walk distance of 0 is set and all other gis modalities are disabled HAFAS is allowed to use start/destination equivalences that are connected by a data foot path.

Since version: 2.26

parameters.name: groupFilter
parameters.description:
Use a predefined group filter to query for certain modes. String not longer than 512.

Since version: 1.23.14

parameters.name: blockingList
parameters.description:
Defines a section of a route of a journey not to be used within the trip search. String not longer than 32768.

Since version: 1.23.18

parameters.name: blockedEdges
parameters.description:
List of edges within the public transport network that should be excluded from the result. String not longer than 32768.

Since version: 2.22

parameters.name: trainComposition
parameters.description:
Enables/disables train composition data.

Since version: 1.0

parameters.name: includeEarlier
parameters.description:
Disables search optimization in relation of duration.

Since version: 1.23.18

parameters.name: withICTAlternatives
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the search for alternatives with individualized change times (ICT).

Since version: 1.23.19

parameters.name: tariff
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the output of tariff data. The default is configurable via provisioning.

Since version: 2.7

parameters.name: trafficMessages
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the output of traffic messages. The default is configurable via provisioning.

Since version: 2.7

parameters.name: travellerProfileData
parameters.description:
Traveller profile data. Structure depends on set up. String not longer than 32768.

Since version: 2.15

parameters.name: withFreq
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the calculation of frequency information.

Since version: 2.18

parameters.name: withJourneyBoundaryPoints
parameters.description:
Enables/disables the return of journey boundary stops at public transport legs.

Since version: 2.24
